column1: Sending off @EFillerCorn and @DickSaslaw at the Fairfax Democrats Road to Richmond brunch. Thanks to all of the volunteers who delivered a bold progressive majority in Richmond. https://t.co/biXxfgtvbl
Great to join my home committee in Providence and congrats to @DaliaPalchik and @KarlFrisch on their resounding victories. https://t.co/QuudRuR0o5
Happy Holidays from the Reston Holiday Parade! https://t.co/pUSVXfBzgz

Thanks to the @BraddockDems who turned a red seat blue on the board by electing @JamesWalkinshaw and helped deliver complete Democratic control of the School Board and a Democratic majority in Richmond. https://t.co/vV94vCAcfP
Thanks to Virginia Democracy Forward for having me tonight for a lively discussion and for all of your work to turn the VA House Blue in 2019. https://t.co/a3gNYdRWUV

Tonight Virginia sent a message to Donald Trump. Our progressive values won tonight and congratulations to @DickSaslaw on becoming majority leader my delegate and the next Speaker of the House @EFillerCorn! https://t.co/xrHeqDaV5r

Ran into Occoquan Councilwoman Cindy Fithian and volunteers at Occoquan Precinct who are helping deliver a Blue PWC by electing @KennyBoddye and re-electing @BaburLateef and @LillieGJessie43 https://t.co/QfxXxf3AJw
Thanks to the @GMUdems who are working the poll. Reminder if you are registered to vote on campus at GMU you can vote at Merten Hall until 7. https://t.co/6wfY3k8po8
Lots of support for @JamesWalkinshaw and @DavidBulova at Sideburn Precinct this morning. Thanks to the volunteers out in the cold handing out Democratic sample ballots! https://t.co/lKYAq0TZd1

On Tuesday Prince William County will finally elect a Board of Supervisors that reflects the diversity of the community. Pleased to launch a canvass today for @delegateguzman @AnninPWC @AmyAshworthVA and @raheelsheikhva . https://t.co/z2wCgoN5nT
Launching a Canvass for @HalaAyala @KennyBoddye and @LillieGJessie43 . Just three more days until we turn Prince William and the House or Delegates blue! https://t.co/xdHrTLtLJP

Launching a canvass with @MarkWarnerVA . We only have 10 days until we flip the legislature blue and deliver a huge victory for our Democratic ticket in fairfax. Sign up to volunteer today: https://t.co/GLyWT2aJpG https://t.co/vz9I7STZU0
Joined @SharonBulova and @SteveDescano at the Annandale Halloween Parade. https://t.co/aAfy8Jp2jf
Great to be out today in support of ⁦@jessfosterva⁩ https://t.co/yakgtAUFO1
Happy Halloween from the Vienna Halloween Parade! https://t.co/Va8rneED7y
Thanks to all of the union members who came out today to canvass for @SullySupervisor @stella_pekarsky and all of our candidates in Sully. https://t.co/GQK3Lv31mZ
Happy Homecoming to the Herndon Hornets! https://t.co/V2kpdFwVRa
Joined @JenniferWexton in support of our next supervisor from Brentsville @HansfordMaggie https://t.co/16Dh65jH7w
Proud to lend my support to my neighbor and the next Providence Supervisor @DaliaPalchik at her annual Fall Festival. https://t.co/nBb2c2oCTB

At a fundraiser for @vasierraclub with @DelegateKeam and @ChapPetersen . Only 38 days until we elect majorities in the Virginia House and Senate that will be environmental champions. https://t.co/JjaEDHzJHH
Celebrating Hispanic Heritage Month with @Castro4Congress at @delegateguzman’s annual gala. We need Elizabeth fighting for us in Richmond. https://t.co/kM1HLlcdq6

Out in support of the Rural Ground Game tonight. The party of Roosevelt and Johnson is still the party of the working people and @vademocrats have a bold agenda to stop the opioid crisis expand access to broadband and reinvest in communities. https://t.co/liAfoP6EHI

It’s #NationalVoterRegistrationDay . If you aren’t registered you can go to https://t.co/3SBP22Tbba and register. If you are already registered in Fairfax or Prince William you can vote absentee in person today: https://t.co/Kx1EoKoG3t https://t.co/e6cWRKvZfB
On to the first annual Big Braddock BBQ for my long-serving aide @JamesWalkinshaw who will serve with integrity on the Fairfax Board. https://t.co/8J7UrXQCTP
Joined @TerryMcAuliffe @EFillerCorn and @SharonBulova for @McKay4Chairman ‘s Oktoberfest. 44 days until we elect Jeff McKay the next Chairman of the Fairfax Board. https://t.co/7An8OjrsFp
Great event thus afternoon in Burke for one of our at-large school board candidates @RachnaHeizer https://t.co/RGjhIBixaS

Thanks to everyone on the @VA11Dems who made tonight’s halfway to St Patrick’s Day fundraiser such a success. Only 51 days until we flip the Virginia House and Senate blue and 182 days til St Patrick’s Day! https://t.co/6O5xLZLPU4
Joined @pwcdanica and @AdamEbbin at a fundraiser tonight in Burke to support our fantastic school board candidate in Springfield @LJ4fcps https://t.co/XelacRc72H
Joined @JenniferWexton and @DonBeyerVA to kickoff day 3 of the @NetworkVirginia women’s summit. https://t.co/MaUFDmJNz7
Helping kickoff the annual Network Nova Women’s Summit. https://t.co/fUXH2y60cm

Losers: Kristin Gillibrand (interrupted constantly) Biden (looked and acted his age) Swallwell (too eager too practiced too plastic) Bennet (earnest but doesn’t connect and ends up angry) Sanders (robotic repetition 2016 redux doesn’t work). Yang and Williamson (non factors)

Much more substantive debate tonight  Winners: Kamala  Harris (vibrant eloquent consistently strong) Pete Buttigieg ( cogent articulate self reflective) Hickenlooper ( demonstrated relevance of his experience to issues ) (1/2)

Winners: Ryan (forceful Rust belt champion) Castro ( specific and powerful voice on immigration) Warren ( polished performer) Gabbard ( powerful on war and her service after 9/11). Really restrictive format (2/2)

Dem debate too crowded to be meaningful. Losers: De Blasio (too angry) Delaney (couldn’t get much in) Inslee (too wonky; one issue guy) Booker (just another Senator)  Klobuchar (too focused on her name on bills) O’Rourke (the generalities never end) 1/2
Speaking at the @vademocrats blue commonwealth gala dinner about the importance of winning the house and senate in 2019. https://t.co/FZ9NU7M7H7

Launching a canvass for ⁦@JamesWalkinshaw⁩ . You can vote at your local government center absentee in person today until 5 or at your normal polling location on Tuesday from 6 AM - 7 PM. https://t.co/1ZRay8ml0z
The WAPO clearly grasps how important these jobs are and how essential relevant experience and credentials are. Congrats to the endorsed candidates and kudos to the WAPO editorial board. (2/2)
The Washington Post has just delivered a thoughtful and incisive series of endorsements for Fairfax County. https://t.co/byU8oXPjX3 (1/2)
Great to be out in support of @AnninPWC @Bailey4theBoard and @HansfordMaggie three of our fantastic candidates for Board of County Supervisors in PWC. https://t.co/OloGl8POpB

Congrats to our Democratic nominees for Fairfax School Board: @Keys_Gamarra @AbrarOmeish and @RachnaHeizer . They’re going to be a fantastic team for our schools. I’ve had the privilege of working alongside @Moon4Schools for 16 years and I can’t thank him enough for his service.
@washingtonpost provides a mature and insightful endorsement of @McKay4Chairman as the next chair of the Fairfax Board of Supervisors. I fully concur. https://t.co/XOHK9uRTxe

I just voted for democratic nominee for school board and soil and water conservation board. You can vote at @FairfaxDems hq until 4 today or at Lake Braddock High School Tuesday night. https://t.co/axKNwxoLnh
Joined @JenniferWexton to make sure we keep @HalaAyala fighting for us in Richmond. Common sense gun safety and ratifying the ERA are on the line in November. https://t.co/S2q009Kqqe
Great to join a packed house at the Northern Virginia Central Labor Council Tribute to Labor dinner. Thanks to my friends in labor for everything you do! https://t.co/OVMPSx8aPL
Great crowd at the @VA11Dems Sturdivant brunch. Congrats to all of today’s winners! https://t.co/bjX1GxQq5X
Congrats to @SharonBulova on being elected a lifetime member of @BraddockDems . Thank you for your years of friendship and service to our county. https://t.co/NYahdNDcZI

Last year the @PWCDems delivered a historic victory for me @timkaine and @JenniferWexton. With the enthusiasm at the Blue Victory tonight I know we will do it again for @AnninPWC and deliver the VA House and Senate for the Dems. https://t.co/RNbTjBPBx2
Great to celebrate @GMUdems at Pennies for Patriots. Their hard work is critical to turning Virginia Blue. https://t.co/PD5J7ygfvI

There’s a special election for Neabsco Supervisor in Prince William County today. If you live in Neabsco please make sure to go out and vote for Vic Angry. Polls are open until 7 pm and you can find your polling location here: https://t.co/Ii3wqDTkrW
With @JeremyMcPike @HalaAyala and @delegateguzman launching a canvass for Vic Angry. If you live in Neabsco don’t forget to vote on Tuesday. https://t.co/PCEHb1DbPK
On to Prince William for an event for @Bailey4theBoard . Andrea will do an amazing job representing Potomac on the PWC board. https://t.co/YyXQhkWqUQ

Budgets are about values. As the Chair of the Fairfax Budget committee @McKay4Chairman has led the fight for our values and to fully fund our schools protect the environment and take care of our neediest residents. https://t.co/2K9DVnJkYJ
Helping kickoff the re-election campaign of our newest state senator @JenniferBoysko https://t.co/NKBjJw1XTc
Thanks to everyone who came out to our St. Patrick’s Day Fete and congrats to @JoeBiden and @McKay4Chairman on winning our straw poll. https://t.co/5JTxpxdJHz
Proud to support my good friend @walter_alcorn for Hunter Mill Supervisor. https://t.co/N40RzHIGLp
With @SharonBulova at @yr2centsworth annual Champagne and Chocolate fundraiser. https://t.co/ccEA2FLryH
